p: Specimens obtained from recruited conscripts were tested for hepatitis B and C using the Elecsys HBsAg II (Roche Diagnostics, Mannheim, Germany) and the Elecsys Anti-HCV II (Roche Diagnostics, Mannheim, Germany) assays, respectively. A signal-to-cut-off ratio (S/CO) equal to or greater than 1.00 is suggested to be positive for anti-HCV and HBsAg by the manufacturer. All hepatitis tests were performed according to the manufacturer's instructions by trained technicians and were conducted at a central laboratory (Vespasiano, MG, Brazil).
